solution_line_template: After giving away a third of his CDs, Tyler has {initial_cds} - {cds_given_away} = <<{initial_cds}-{cds_given_away}={cds_after_giving_away}>>{cds_after_giving_away} CDs
After buying new CDs, Tyler has {cds_after_giving_away} + {new_cds_bought} = <<{cds_after_giving_away}+{new_cds_bought}={total_cds_now}>>{total_cds_now} CDs
